meanings.definition: A rich fabric, typically embroidered with gold or silver thread.
meanings.sent1: The queen's gown was made of luxurious orfray.
meanings.sent2: The orfray shimmered under the chandeliers at the royal ball.
meanings.sent3: The orfray on the pillow looked so fancy that the cat thought it was a throne.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the golden threads of orfray, weaving joy into the room.
meanings.sent5: The orfray draped over the chair added an air of elegance to the room.
